mapper.select:
select lo.*,lc.username customer_name ,lc.image customer_pic from oms_order lo join ums_member lc on lo.customer_id=lc.id and lc.del_flag = '0' where lo.order_type='3' and group_head='1'
and lo.group_id=#{groupId}
and lo.group_status != '-1'
order by lo.create_time desc
select * from oms_order where group_id = #{groupId} and group_head = '0' and group_status != '-1'
select * from oms_order where group_id = #{groupId} and group_status != '-1' and customer_id = #{customerId}
SELECT count(1) from oms_order where group_id = #{groupId} and group_status = '0'
mapper.update: update oms_order set group_status = '1' where group_id = #{groupId} and group_status = '0'
update oms_order set status = '5' , cancel_reson = '0' where group_id = #{groupId} and group_status = '-1'
update oms_order set status = '5' , cancel_reson = '0' where group_id = #{groupId} and group_status = '-1' and customer_id = #{customerId}
mapper.select: select * from oms_order where order_type='3' and group_status !='1' and auto_handle_status !='1' and open_group_time < DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 1 day)
select * from oms_order where order_type='3' and group_status='-1' and auto_handle_status !='1' and group_head='0' and status='1' and create_time < DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 1 day)
mapper.update: update oms_order set auto_handle_status = '1' where id = #{orderId} and auto_handle_status = '0'
mapper.select:
select lo.*,lsi.store_name store_name from oms_order lo LEFT JOIN t_store_info lsi on lo.store_id=lsi.id where lo.order_type='3' and lo.group_head='0'
and lo.group_status=#{status}
and lo.group_status='0'
and lo.store_id=#{storeId}
and lo.store_id !=0
and lo.pay_time > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 1 day)
and lo.pay_time < DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 1 day)
and lo.group_status !='-1' order by lo.pay_time desc
